name: Ext_R3_CarePlan_ac_oCP
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.CarePlan.activity.outcomeCodeableConcept for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents CarePlan.activity.outcomeCodeableConcept from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CarePlan|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Identifies the outcome at the point when the status of the activity is assessed.  For example, the outcome of an education activity could be patient understands (or not).
element.comment: `CarePlan.activity.outcomeCodeableConcept` maps to R5 `CarePlan.activity.performedActivity`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Identifies the outcome at the point when the status of the activity is assessed.  For example, the outcome of an education activity could be patient understands (or not).
element.comment: `CarePlan.activity.outcomeCodeableConcept` maps to R5 `CarePlan.activity.performedActivity`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Identifies the results of the activity
